blog.description: Call me Starla  23. Tomcat Bisexual. Polyam. INTP. Enby Woman. They/Them & She/Her. White. No TERFs, radfems, or gender critical blogs allowed to follow. Hello, and thanks for stopping by my page! I'm a graduated English major desperately looking for a job lmao. halp. My hobbies include writing, reading, baking, listening to music, & shipping healthy couples. (icon by youmattered)

summary: “What’s Never Been” (a Peter B. Parker x Reader)
body:
“What’s Never Been” (a Peter B. Parker x Reader)

I never thought I’d write a Peter B. Parker x Reader story but here we are. :D It’s been forever since I wrote a fanfic. 

Just heads up, this one is sad. :( 

While mourning the divorce between him and MJ, he leans on you, his friend and new neighbor (you live right above him in an apartment building). Through this challenging time, you provide him all he needs: food, distraction, hugs, a shoulder to cry on, etc. He is very thankful for what you’ve done and doesn’t hold back on showing gratitude. He expresses his appreciation in multiple ways, from warm smiles to ice cream.

To gentle kisses.

It’s not like you planned on hooking up with him. As cliche as it sounds, it just sorta happened. It started off as another night of him at your place, watching a movie with you on the couch and lamenting his split up with MJ. Through all this, his hand lingered near yours. A scary scene pops up on the film you are watching and your fingers instantly intertwine with his. It was as if on instinct. Hand holding lead to resting your head on his shoulder, which led to placing a soft kiss on your forehead. Which lead to one on your cheek, then one on your lips. It started off tame. Both sets of lips were closed. The longer it lasted, the more intense it became. Mouths opened and tongues were used. His hands wandered from your shoulders to your waist. You felt him gently press you down. Now that he’s on top of you, he started kissing your neck and made his way down to your shoulder. Your fingers slid under his shirt and his did the same.

You both eventually moved to the bedroom.

The next morning, you hazily wake up to find him snoring next to you. The warm sunshine cascaded across his sleeping figure. It made him look heavenly. His arm was wrapped around you protectively. Though your hair was a mess and you had no makeup, you didn’t care. In this moment, you felt secure and serene.

Something deep within you warned you not to get too close, not to fall in love. But it was too late. You’ve been crushing on him for a little while now. Not since you met him, but for a couple weeks for sure. You certainly didn’t feel like a rebound. You’ve, unfortunately, been one before and that guy made a move on you right after his break up. He only cared about getting what he wanted and nothing more. As soon as he landed a new girlfriend, you were quickly forgotten.  Peter was not like that. He cherished you. He liked spending time with you. He was there for you just as much as you were there for him. Maybe, just maybe, he started having feelings for you, too.

Your thoughts were interrupted by a loud yawn. Groggily, he opened his eyes. Once he saw you, a content smile spread across his face. A small peck was planted on your cheek.

“Good morning.” he murmured.

Days, then weeks, pass. You two continue whatever relationship you had. Neither one of you bothered to put a label on it. You wanted to, but thought claiming the title of “girlfriend” would be too much for Peter. After all, he was still reeling from his divorce. It was best to take things slow. So, you both laughed like friends and kissed like lovers. And that was fine because you were so madly in love that you were sure he felt the same. You hoped that one day you could become more than friends with benefits.

Then, he just disappeared. He was gone for a couple of days. His absence scared you. Where is he? Is he safe? Did someone take him? Will he be okay? These worries were irrational because you knew he could take care of himself. He was able to stay cool and collected even in the most terrifying of circumstances. Adding onto that, he was incredibly strong and fast. He’d be okay.

Sure enough, he texted you once he returned. He went on and on about being at some sort of family gathering and meeting a whole bunch of people that were so alike him and how the experience changed him.

And then he broke the news that he was going to rekindle his romance with MJ.

You felt your heart plummet. He said that being with his family made him realize that he does want to have kids, that he does have more of a fathering instinct than he initially thought.

You didn’t text back.

He sent many more messages and even tried to call. You didn’t answer any of them. Instead, you turned off your phone and shut yourself indoors. You felt dumb, naive even, for thinking you two would be anything more than friends.

During your moping, you heard a banging at the door. You groaned out of frustration and dragged yourself over to see who was there. Sure enough, it was him. He looked worried.

“Where were you?!” he exclaimed. “I’ve been calling and texting you for days now!”

Play it cool. Don’t let him know you are upset. That’s you told yourself.

“Oh, you know, just…been busy. I, uh, have been feeling kind of sick lately so I’ve been working from home.” you said, avoiding eye contact.

“…Are you upset about-”

“I said I’ve been WORKING, Peter.”

He sighed. “Right, right. Sorry.” He turned to leave, but stopped. “Look, you’re my closest friend. If…you ever want to talk, just know I’m here.” Then he was gone.

You’re the last person I ever want to talk to. You shut the door.

body:
Peter Parker in gym class

There was 10000% a point in time where everyone saw Peters abs in PE. There’s no way they could miss them. There first thoughts initially were probably the fact that ‘Holy crap, he could have destroyed Flash in 0.02 seconds if he wanted to’ but the next thought would probably be ‘how the hell is this huge nerd keeping up his grades and keeping his body that sculpted?!?’

You cannot convince me that people didn’t start going out of their way to start visiting every gym in New York to try and see what the hell he was doing only to never find him in any gym. People starting up theories that Peter had some kind of god-like training regime that he did at his own house. Someone spotting Peter entering Avengers tower for his ‘Internship’ and another theory began that he had access to the gyms in there.

Then Peter and Ned obviously find out about all of this stuff from MJ and find it absolutely hilarious. They decide it would be funny to go to one of the cheapest gyms in queens and just have him lift rediculously heavy things with as little effort as possible. Of course someone from school sees this and looses their mind. The next day they are trying to convince everyone that Peter Parker was lifting 500lbs with one hand and it didn’t even look like it bothered him. No one believes him of course.

One day in gym class however they do weight lifting , for some reason. At this point, everyone knows about Peters abs so he doesn’t even bother trying to hide his strength. He starts doing rediculous stuff like doing on the Avengers group chat and texting them while holding a rediculous amount of weight above his head.

It’s gotten to the point where no one even cares about it anymore and everyone kinda just knows Peter as the one who is really strong for some reason.

blog.name: marvelheroperil
blog.title: Marvel Superheroes in Peril
blog.description: This is a backup blog to the sideblog MarvelPeril in case it gets deactivated. This blog dedicates to Marvel superheroes falling into perilous situations such as getting captured, hurt or whatever. Note that there WON'T be any pictures of superheroes from live-action Marvel movies/TV Shows.

summary: Spider-Man is attacked and blown away by the sentient devil wind. And then, he gets bitten by a demon-possessed gargoyle.  - The...
caption:
Spider-Man is attacked and blown away by the sentient devil wind. And then, he gets bitten by a demon-possessed gargoyle. 

- The Spectacular Spider-Man v1 #147, 1989 (Inferno tie-in)

blog.description: A photo every weekday from notes, pull-list records, back issue finds, recent acquisitions and other comics stuff.

summary: Miles Morales: Spider-Man #1 (February 2019) It is so great to finally get a Mile Morales comic not written by Brian Michael...
caption:
Miles Morales: Spider-Man #1 (February 2019)

It is so great to finally get a Mile Morales comic not written by Brian Michael Bendis. While I am glad he co-created the character, Miles never felt or sounded right in Bendis’s hands. And it is not just that Bendis a white due and not Afro-Latino, because the new writer,Saladin Ahmed, is not Afro-Latino either, but he writes with a sensitivity and boldness that works. I look forward to more.

reblog.comment:

It is so great to finally get a Mile Morales comic not written by Brian Michael Bendis. While I am glad he co-created the character, Miles never felt or sounded right in Bendis’s hands. And it is not just that Bendis a white due and not Afro-Latino, because the new writer,Saladin Ahmed, is not Afro-Latino either, but he writes with a sensitivity and boldness that works.
